item.title: What Is Marburg Virus? Eight Killed In Suspected Outbreak In Tanzania
item.description: Nine cases of the deadly disease have been reported in the Kagera region of Tanzania so far. But officials expect that number to rise.

item.title: New Diffusion Models Offer Keys To Success For Resource-Scarce Systems
item.description: Generative AI can benefit from some types of compression and other best practices for diffusion tasks.

item.title: Honda-Nissan Plan, Stellantis Problems May Prompt More Mega-Mergers
item.description: The mooted Honda Nissan merger and the fallout from leadership change at Stellantis suggests the auto industry must brace for turmoil, where size is a...

item.title: Bad News For ‘Skeleton Crew’ Season 2, Which Doesn’t Deserve It
item.description: Skeleton Crew was incredible, but attempting to get a season 2 is something of a dire prospect, given the context of its performance.

item.title: Here’s The First, Incredible ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Trailer, At Long Last
item.description: Here is the first trailer for Daredevil: Born Again, which is absolutely a must-watch ahead of his return to the MCU.
